member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_Application
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_FocusedItem
member.summary: Gets the FolderItem object that represents the item that has input focus.
member.param: The FolderItem object with input focus.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_Folder
member.summary: Gets the Folder object that represents the view.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_Parent
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_Script
member.summary: Gets the scripting object for the view.
member.param: The scripting object for the view. This represents the scripting automation model.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.get_ViewOptions
member.summary: Gets a set of flags that indicate the current options of the view.
member.param: The set of flags that indicate the current options of the view.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.PopupItemMenu
member.summary: Creates a shortcut menu for the specified item and returns the selected command string.
member.param: The FolderItem for which to create a shortcut menu.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.SelectedItems
member.summary: Gets a FolderItems object that represents all of the selected items in the view.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual.SelectItem
member.summary: Sets the selection state of an item in the view.
member.param: The flags representing the state of the object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderViewDual
member.summary: Exposes methods that modify the view and select items in the current folder.
